title: Snowy Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of Snowy Elements! 

This package contains 12 Snowy Elements sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/Up-VYkA6CQ8


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 24 FPS


Texture Resolutions:

● Snowy Element 01_1536 × 1152

● Snowy Element 02_2560 × 1728

● Snowy Element 03_2560 × 1728

● Snowy Element 04_2048 × 1728

● Snowy Element 05_2048 × 1728

● Snowy Element 06_2560 × 1440

● Snowy Element 07_3072 × 2016

● Snowy Element 08_2560 × 1728

● Snowy Element 09_2048 × 1440

● Snowy Element 10_3072 × 2016

● Snowy Element 11_2560 × 2016

● Snowy Element 12_2560 × 2016


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
